result.execSummary:
The defendant Justin J. Marquette was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).
  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).
  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Defendant shall not consume alcohol or other intoxicants.  Defendant must maintain absolute sobriety.
Defendant shall undergo an AODA Assessment and follow through with any recommendations resulting therefrom.

9:55.  (12ct254/14cf109/14cf121) Defendant, Justin J. Marquette, in court with attorney Karl A Green.  Attorney Yolanda J. Tienstra appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Recess.  Case recalled 10:01.  Court reviews to PQ/WOR, Stip & Rec.   Recess.  Atty Tienstra heard regarding Stip & Rec.  Atty Green concurs.  Deft pleads NC to Ct. 1 in 14cf109; NC to Cts 1, 2 + 3 in 14cf121.  Court confirms plea in 12CT254.  Court finds suff fact basis, pleas made f/v/k/i, accepts pleas and finds Deft guilty of Ct.1 in 14cf109 with Ct 2 beind D-RI, guilty of Cts. 1, 2 + 3 in 14cf121 and guity of Ct. 1 in 12CT254 w/ Ct. 2 D-RI  Atty Tienstra heard.  Atty Green heard.  Statement by Deft. Court orders:

sentence w/held
probation for 3 years
restitution of $2675.58 --pd thru Dodge County Clerk of Courts
court costs
AODA + follow thru
absolute sobriety

sentence w/held
probation for 3 years
one year jail sentence imposed + stayed
restitution of $640 --pd thru Dodge County Clerk of Courts
AODA
court costs
absolute sobriety

14CF109, 14CF121 & 12CT254 - Defendant Justin J. Marquette in court, in custody with attorney Greg E Vollan(eligible).  Gilbert G Thompson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant has received copy of Criminal Complaint and advised of rights, charges, penalties and right to Preliminary Hearing. CT to track w/CF cases. Court finds probable cause. Prelim requested within time limits. Prelim set. Court sets bond at $500 Cash bond  with conditions:   Defendant shall not have any direct or indirect contact or communication with victims and residences.    The Jail shall permit Defendant to make a phone call at the county expense for bail purposes.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 26, 2014 at 10:00 am.
